meanings.sent1: The new flowers were bunchier than the old ones.
meanings.sent2: The grapes on this vine are getting bunchier by the day.
meanings.sent3: The picnic blanket looked even bunchier after the wind blew it around.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky seemed to gather in a bunchier formation.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's toy with all the colorful blocks was the bunchier choice for playtime.

meanings.sent1: The fabric of this shirt is bunchier than the one I usually wear.

meanings.sent3: The socks in the drawer always end up in a bunchier mess.
meanings.sent4: The students in the classroom became bunchier as they worked on the group project.
meanings.sent5: The traffic on the highway seemed to move in a bunchier pattern during rush hour.
